scripts.clean: find . -name node_modules -o -name .next -o -name .expo -o -name .turbo -o -name dist -type d -prune | xargs rm -rf && find . -name tsconfig.tsbuildinfo | xargs rm -f
scripts.db:init:dev: docker-compose up -d && echo 'Waiting a few seconds for DBs to start...' && sleep 5 && turbo run db:migrate && turbo run db:seed
scripts.db:init:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && echo 'Waiting a few seconds for DBs to start...' && sleep 5 && NODE_ENV=test turbo run db:migrate
scripts.test:e2e: turbo run build --filter web && turbo run test:e2e
